                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Output 7:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 输出 7：

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          exit (message="The shipping report from 08/05/2022 to 03/01/2023 has been created.") exit (message="从08/05/2022到03/01/2023的运输报告已生成。")

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A.2. Replanner Examples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A.2. 重新计划示例

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A.2.1. QUERY REFINEMENT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A.2.1. 查询细化

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          This section presents an example of how a replanner refines an initial plan when an execution failure occurs. 本节展示了当执行失败发生时，重新规划器如何优化初始计划的示例。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Task: "How long does it take to walk from Carnegie Museum of Art to a library at CMU?" 任务：“从卡内基艺术博物馆步行到卡内基梅隆大学（CMU）图书馆需要多长时间？”

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Initial Plan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 初步计划

                                                                                                                                                                                                                           

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ##Step 1 ##步骤 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Reasoning: From the initial HTML state, I observe that I am on the 推理：从初始的HTML状态来看，我注意到我处于

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          OpenStreetMap website. The page includes a search input field. The
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          OpenStreetMap网站。页面包含一个搜索输入框。
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          first step is to search for libraries at CMU to identify which one
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          第一步是在CMU搜索库以确定使用哪一个
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          we'll get directions to.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          我们将获得前往的路线。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Step: Search for libraries at CMU. 步骤：在卡内基梅隆大学(CMU)搜索图书馆。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ##Step 2 ##步骤 2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Reasoning: After finding the libraries at CMU, we need to analyze the 推理：在找到卡内基梅隆大学（CMU）的图书馆后，我们需要分析

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          search results to identify the available libraries and select one for
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          搜索结果以确定可用的库并选择其中一个用于
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          getting directions.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          获取路线指引。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Step: Review the search results and select a library at CMU. 步骤：查看搜索结果并选择卡内基梅隆大学（CMU）的一家图书馆。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ##Step 3 ##步骤 3

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Reasoning: Now that we have identified a specific library, we can initiate 推理：既然我们已经确定了一个具体的图书馆，就可以开始

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          the process of finding directions between the two points.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          查找两点之间路线的过程。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Step: Initiate the process of finding directions. 步骤：启动查找路线的过程。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ##Step 4 ##步骤 4

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Reasoning: After initiating the direction-finding process, we need to input 推理：启动路线查找过程后，我们需要输入

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          the starting location, which is 'Carnegie Museum of Art'.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          起点位置，即“卡内基艺术博物馆”（Carnegie Museum of Art）。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Step: Input 'Carnegie Museum of Art' as the starting location. 步骤：输入“卡内基艺术博物馆”作为起点位置。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ##Step 5 ##步骤 5

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Reasoning: With the starting location set, we need to input the selected 推理：设置好起点后，我们需要输入选定的

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          library as the destination.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          图书馆作为终点。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Step: Input the selected CMU library as the destination. 步骤：输入选定的卡内基梅隆大学（CMU）图书馆作为终点。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ##Step 6 ##步骤 6

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Reasoning: To ensure that the directions provided are for walking, we need 推理：为了确保提供的是步行路线，我们需要

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          to select the appropriate option for walking directions.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          选择步行路线的相应选项。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Step: Select the option for walking directions. 步骤：选择步行路线选项。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ##Step 7 ##步骤 7

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Reasoning: After all parameters are set, we can analyze the results to 推理：在所有参数设置完成后，我们可以分析结果以

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          determine the walking time between the two locations.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          确定两个地点之间的步行时间。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Step: Analyze the results to determine the walking time from Carnegie 步骤：分析结果以确定从卡内基艺术博物馆（Carnegie Museum of Art）

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Museum of Art to the selected CMU library.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          到所选卡内基梅隆大学（CMU）图书馆的步行时间。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                           

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Executor's Actions: The executor attempts to search for libraries at CMU by performing the following actions:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 执行者操作：执行者尝试通过以下操作搜索卡内基梅隆大学的图书馆：

                                                                                                                                                                                                                           

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              #Element: the search bar
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              #元素：搜索栏

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          do(action="Search", argument="Library at CMU", element="13") 执行（action="Search"，argument="Library at CMU"，element="13"）

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          #Element: the search button
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          #元素：搜索按钮
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          do (action="Click", element="13")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          执行（action="Click"，element="13"）

                                                                                                                                                                                                                           

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          However, upon executing this step, the system receives the following HTML response, which indicates that no search results were found: 然而，执行此步骤后，系统收到以下HTML响应，表明未找到搜索结果：

                                                                                                                                                                                                                           

                                                                                                                                                                                                                           

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <li id="17" data-text="No results found"> No results found </li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          <li id="17" data-text="No results found"> 未找到结果 </li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ...

                                                                                                                                                                                                                           

                                                                                                                                                                                                                           

                                                                                                                                                                                                                           

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          This failure necessitates a refinement of the plan. 此失败需要对计划进行调整。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Replanning - Refining the Search Query: Since the initial search query ("Library at CMU") returned no results, the replanner modified the query to a more general term: "Library near CMU" to improve the likelihood of retrieving relevant results.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 重新规划 - 优化搜索查询：由于初始搜索查询（“Library at CMU”）未返回结果，重新规划者将查询修改为更通用的词语：“Library near CMU”，以提高检索相关结果的可能性。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Refined Plan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 优化后的计划

                                                                                                                                                                                                                           

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ##Step 1 ##步骤 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Reasoning: From the current HTML state, I observe that the page shows 推理：从当前HTML状态来看，我观察到页面显示

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          search results with ’No results found’ (element with id='17'). The
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          搜索结果显示“未找到结果”（元素id='17'）。
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          page contains a search bar (id='12') and a Go button (id='13') for
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          页面包含一个搜索栏（id='12'）和一个“前往”按钮（id='13'）用于
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          initiating new searches. There's also a direction sign icon
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          正在启动新的搜索。还有一个方向指示标志图标
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (id='14') that likely allows for finding directions between two
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (id='14') 这很可能允许在两点之间寻找路径
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          points. The main content area provides information about
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          点数。主要内容区域提供有关
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          OpenStreetMap and its contributors. Looking at the previous
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          OpenStreetMap及其贡献者。回顾之前的
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          actions, I can see that the user attempted to search for 'Library
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          操作，我可以看到用户尝试搜索“Library”
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          at ${\mathrm{{CMU}}}^{\prime }$ and clicked the Go button,but this broad search query
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          在${\mathrm{{CMU}}}^{\prime }$点击了“前往”按钮，但这个广泛的搜索查询
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          including 'Library at CMU' returned no results. This indicates that
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          包括“CMU图书馆”未返回任何结果。这表明
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          we need to modify our approach by simplifying the search terms.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          我们需要通过简化搜索词来调整我们的方法。
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Given these observations and the failed previous search attempt, we
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          鉴于这些观察结果以及之前搜索尝试的失败，我们
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          need to refine our search query by removing the 'Library at CMU'
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          需要通过去除“CMU图书馆”来优化我们的搜索查询
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          specification and focusing more specifically on libraries near CMU
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          规范，并更具体地关注卡内基梅隆大学（CMU）附近的图书馆
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          to get more relevant results.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          以获得更相关的结果。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Step: Refine the search query by focusing on libraries near CMU. 步骤：通过关注卡内基梅隆大学（CMU）附近的图书馆来优化搜索查询。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ##Step 2 ##步骤 2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Reasoning: After refining the search query, we need to analyze the 推理：在优化搜索查询后，我们需要分析

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          search results to identify potential libraries that are near CMU.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          搜索结果，以识别靠近卡内基梅隆大学（CMU）的潜在图书馆。
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          This will help in determining the closest library based on the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          这将有助于根据
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          search results.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          搜索结果确定最近的图书馆。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Step: Analyze the search results to identify potential libraries near 步骤：分析搜索结果以识别靠近

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          CMU.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                           

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ##Step 3 ##步骤3

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Reasoning: With the list of potential libraries identified, the next 推理：在确定潜在图书馆列表后，下一步

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          step is to get directions to each library from Carnegie Museum of
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          是获取从卡内基艺术博物馆（Carnegie Museum of Art）到每个图书馆的路线。
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Art. This will help in determining the distance and time required
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          这将有助于确定到达每个图书馆所需的距离和时间，
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          to reach each library, allowing us to identify the closest one.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          从而识别出最近的图书馆。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Step: Get walking directions to each identified library from Carnegie 步骤：获取从卡内基艺术博物馆到每个已识别图书馆的步行路线。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Museum of Art.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ##Step 4 ##步骤4

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Reasoning: After obtaining the distances and times for each library, 推理：在获得每个图书馆的距离和时间后，

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          the final step is to identify the closest library based on the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          最后一步是根据记录的距离确定最近的图书馆，
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          recorded distances and provide the result to the user.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          并将结果提供给用户。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Step: Identify the closest library based on the recorded distances and 步骤：根据记录的距离确定最近的图书馆，并

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          provide the result to the user.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          向用户提供结果。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                           

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Executor's Next Action According to the Refined Plan: To reflect the updated strategy, the executor modifies its search action:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 执行者根据优化计划的下一步行动：为了反映更新后的策略，执行者调整了其搜索动作：

                                                                                                                                                                                                                           

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          do (action="Search", argument="Library near CMU", element="12") 执行 (action="Search", argument="CMU附近的图书馆", element="12")

                                                                                                                                                                                                                           

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A.2.2. ANALYZING SEARCH RESULTS AND MEMORY (AGGREGATING RESULTS ACROSS MULTIPLE PAGES) A.2.2. 分析搜索结果与记忆（跨多页汇总结果）

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          This section presents an example of how a replanner refines an initial plan when a broad high-level step, such as "analyze the search results," needs to be refined into concrete actions. 本节展示了当一个宽泛的高级步骤，如“分析搜索结果”，需要细化为具体操作时，重新规划器如何完善初始计划的示例。

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Task: "Present the monthly count of successful orders from Jan to December 2022 in MM:COUNT format" 任务：“以MM:数量格式展示2022年1月至12月的成功订单月度统计”

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Initial Plan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • 初步计划

                                                                                                                                                                                                                           

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          ##Step 1 ##步骤 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Reasoning: From the initial HTML state, I observe that I am on the Magento 推理：从初始的HTML状态来看，我注意到我处于Magento平台上

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          for each month.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          successful orders from January to December 2022.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
